Storyline

Professional Brooklyn hitman Jimmy Conlon is more commonly known as THE 
GRAVEDIGGER. Jimmy was a mob hit-man, who was best friends with his boss 
Sean Maguire. But when Jimmy's son, Michael, is marked for death by the mob, 
Jimmy must go up against Sean to protect Michael at all costs. Together, 
he and Michael must avoid corrupt cops, contract killers and the mob to 
survive the night.
